name: PyWinpty release v2.0.9
body:
Minor pywinpty release that updates several Rust dependencies, including the backend library `winpty-rs`. It also provides official Python 3.11 wheels.

## What's Changed
* Bump winpty-rs from 0.3.8 to 0.3.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/285
* Bump syn from 1.0.99 to 1.0.100 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/282
* Bump libc from 0.2.132 to 0.2.133 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/283
* Bump libc from 0.2.133 to 0.2.137 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/294
* Bump proc-macro2 from 1.0.43 to 1.0.47 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/292
* Bump syn from 1.0.100 to 1.0.101 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/288
* Bump once_cell from 1.14.0 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/286
* Bump lock_api from 0.4.8 to 0.4.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/284
* Enable Python 3.11 support by @andfoy in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/296


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.8...v2.0.9

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.7
body:
This is a minor pywinpty release that updates several dependencies, including `winpty-rs` to its latest version, v0.3.8

## What's Changed
* Bump winpty-rs from 0.3.7 to 0.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/255
* Bump unicode-ident from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/254
* Bump redox_syscall from 0.2.13 to 0.2.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/256
* Bump proc-macro2 from 1.0.40 to 1.0.42 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/257
* Bump redox_syscall from 0.2.15 to 0.2.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/258
* Bump indoc from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/259
* Bump unindent from 0.1.9 to 0.1.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/260
* Bump proc-macro2 from 1.0.42 to 1.0.43 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/261
* Bump syn from 1.0.98 to 1.0.99 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/262
* Bump libc from 0.2.126 to 0.2.127 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/263
* Bump unicode-ident from 1.0.2 to 1.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/265
* Bump quote from 1.0.20 to 1.0.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/pull/264


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/andfoy/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.6...v2.0.7

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.6
body:
Minor pywinpty release that brings support with the latest `winpty-rs` version, as well other dependencies.

## What's Changed
* Test if closed in terminate tests by @blink1073 in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/228
* Bump pyo3 from 0.16.0 to 0.16.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/229
* Bump pyo3 from 0.16.1 to 0.16.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/233
* Bump syn from 1.0.86 to 1.0.89 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/236
* Bump libc from 0.2.119 to 0.2.121 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/238
* PR: Update dependencies to latest versions by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/252


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.5...v2.0.6

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.5
body:
Minor pywinpty release that brings compatibility with winpty-rs v0.3.6

## What's Changed
* PR: Update winpty-rs to v0.3.6 by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/226


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.4...v2.0.5

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.4
body:
Minor pywinpty release that brings support for both `winpty-rs` v0.3.4 and `windows-2022` CI images. Python 3.6 support was dropped officially.

## What's Changed
* PR: Update winpty-rs to v0.3.4 by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/219


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.3...v2.0.4

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.3
body:
Minor PyWinPTY release that temporarily disables ConPTY testing and updates some dependencies.

## What's Changed
* PR: Add test that terminate causes EOFError by @blink1073 in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/213
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/215
* Update pyo3 requirement from 0.15.0 to 0.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/214


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.2
body:
Minor pywinpty release that provides compatibility with winpty-rs v0.3.3

## What's Changed
* PR: Update winpty-rs version to v0.3.3 by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/211


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.1
body:
Minor pywinpty release that fixed a major issue with the wheel distribution, which was not including the winpty binaries.

## What's Changed
* PR: Remove .exe and .dll from gitignore when creating wheels by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/208


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.1-pre0
body: Testing release

name: PyWinpty release v2.0.0
body:
Major pywinpty release that simplifies the dependencies as well the building environment. The PTY implementation details were moved into their own library in rust, [`winpty-rs`](https://github.com/andfoy/winpty-rs) and C++ dependencies were dropped, which implies that this library functions as a simple PyO3 wrapper that calls `winpty-rs` without any added complexities.

## Backward compatible changes
* `PTY` and `PtyProcess` no longer accept an `encoding` keyword argument.

## Performance improvements
* `PtyProcess` reading thread is now blocking, and no longer consumes CPU unnecessarily.

## Other improvements
* The `backend` argument is now working on `PtyProcess`.

## What's Changed
* Update windows requirement from 0.26.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/203
* Update windows requirement from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/204
* PR: Move implementation to use winpty-rs by @andfoy in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/206


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/compare/v1.1.6...v2.0.0

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.6
body:
Minor release that improves the support on arm64 (although not tested) and re-enables support for win32 builds, thanks to @nsait-linaro and @cgohlke. Also, some Rust dependencies were updated to their latest versions.

## What's Changed
* enable building pywinpty without winpty and debug code by @nsait-linaro in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/198
* Fix compile error C2664 on win32 by @cgohlke in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/192
* Update pyo3 requirement from 0.14.1 to 0.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/194
* add support for arm64 compilation by @nsait-linaro in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/199
* Update windows requirement from 0.21.1 to 0.26.0 in /findlib by @dependabot in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/196

## New Contributors
* @nsait-linaro made their first contribution in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/198
* @cgohlke made their first contribution in https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/pull/192

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/spyder-ide/pywinpty/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#version-116-2021-11-15

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.5
body: Minor pywinpty release that updates some Rust dependencies and adds support for Python 3.10

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.4
body: This is a minor release of pywinpty that updates some Rust dependencies versions, as well it provides support for the latest Maturin release, which fixes some issues with PyPy wheel tag naming.

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.3
body: Minor release of pywinpty that fixes some issues related to stderr redirection and pseudoterminal creation inside a graphical application when using the ConPTY backend.

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.2
body: Minor pywinpty release that fixes some deprecated attributes, as well as some minor Rust dependency updates.

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.1
body: Minor pywinpty release that fixes further issues related to PyPi source distributions that are being tried to be installed on Python 2.7

name: PyWinpty release v1.1.0
body: Minor Pywinpty release that fixes some issues related to process EOF detection that caused some processes to hang.

name: PyWinpty release v1.0.1
body: Minor pywinpty release that prevents installation and compilation on Python 2.7

name: PyWinpty release v1.0.0
body:
Major release of pywinpty after two years!

## Major new features
* Pywinpty now supports the native API to create pseudoterminals, ConPTY.
* Wheel distribution for Python 3.9

## Major breaking compatibility changes
* Pywinpty is now compiled using Rust instead of Cython.
* Low level `PTY` object has no `close()` method anymore.

name: pywinpty release v0.5.7
body: Minor pywinpty release: Fix Python 3.8 release publishing

name: pywinpty release v0.5.6
body: Minor pywinpty release: Python 3.8 support.

name: pywinpty v0.5.5 release
body: Minor pywinpty release: Python 3.7 support.

name: pywinpty v0.5.4 release
body: Minor Pywinpty release: Access violation error was definitely fixed thanks to @axil

name: pywinpty v0.5.3 release
body: Minor pywinpty release: Added MinGW GCC dependencies to wheel distributions

name: pywinpty v0.5.2 release
body: Minor Pywinpty release: Support for MSVC compilation dropped, Excessive CPU consumption on high-level API fixed and access violation error detection on Windows 7 systems

name: pywinpty v0.5 release
body: Major pywinpty release: Now supporting Python 2.7!

name: pywinpty v0.4.1 release
body: Minor Pywinpty release: Winpty binaries were added to automatic wheel compilation on AppVeyor

name: pywinpty v0.4 release
body: Major pywinpty release: Thanks to @blink1073 the library now provides a rich and high level interface to create processes and keep track of their execution. Also, all I/O bound operations were improved, sanitized and stabilized.

name: pywinpty v0.3 release
body: Major pywinpty release, some stabillity-related issues were addressed on this release. Also a higher-lever wrapper around a PTY process is introduced

name: pywinpty v0.2.1 release
body: Minor pywinpty release: Some critical ctypes issues were fixed, pywinpty normal behaviour was restored.

name: pywinpty v0.2.0 release
body: pywinpty major version release: pywin32 package was removed from dependencies

name: pywinpty v0.1.4 release
body: Minor pywinpty release: Library now checks size dimensions before creating/resizing a PTY

name: pywinpty v0.1.3 release
body: Minor pywinpty release: Python wheels now include winpty binaries.

name: pywinpty v0.1.2 release
body: On this version we added a brand-new function to know if a process is alive or not.

name: pywinpty v0.1.1 release
body: On this version we made minor modifications to the wrapper. Most changes are testing and CI-related.
